General.Name: Jiin Ming Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiin Ming Industry Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells products related to metal/plastic body parts and components. The company primarily offers parts and components of notebook computers, LCD monitors, LCD TVs, and other 3C products. Its products comprise LCD display components, including bezels, back covers, support brackets, and reflectors; notebook components, such as frames, bottoms, and shieldings; flat panel display components comprising bezels, middle frames, panel brackets, and covers; and 3C product components, including MP3 covers/components, heat spreaders, and multimedia products. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
